Hey there, I'm Tabea, 22 years old, coming from Potsdam. I love the city of Potsdam for its many parks and surrounding water - and Berlin is very close. In my free time I play the guitar, I sing in the university choir, and I play tennis (at least a little bit). I also love coffee and reading books. On the picture you can see me and my boyfriend Julian. We went to school together and then moved to NL to study here.
